review_body: Just walking around here, everywhere wonderful. Street food, clothing n many more.. We walking during winter on march, very cold. Sometimes have to walking in subway to reduce cold
Full of young people and full of fashion trends. So interesting and it seems to be never ending street. Nice place!
A pleace where youth shops, meets, relaxes, and enjoyes lifeLots of shops and a big variety to choose from!

Many variety we can get here when we window shopping at this palace. Also we can get cheaper price at there and quality of product.Normally the product by handmade.The HALAL foods also we can get there like beef kebab,ice-cream,nasi briyani and etcSo,if you go there please enjoy it for shopping!!
